label: issuer
comment: The organisation that is the isuer of this VC. Note that the "id" property MUST be a W3C DID.  Other identifiers such as tax registration numbers can be listed in the "otherIdentifiers" property.

rangeIncludes.comment: An organisation.  May be a supply chain actor, a certifier, a government agency.

domainIncludes.comment: A verifiable credential is a digital and verifiable version of everyday credentials such as certificates and licenses.  It conforms to the W3C Verifiable Credentials Data Model v2.0 (VCDM)
